Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Renissance
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel one night cruise port miami arrived uk lot research choosing precruise hotel miami location bayside appealing many recent reviews hotel disappointing main miami also didnt great press end choice jw marriott consistently good reviews price led choose jw marriott werent disappointed flying uk connecting orlando flight miami delayed eventually arrived hotel taxi quite late 1030pm checked quickly efficiently staff friendly impressed room tastefully furnished clean lovely bed linens nice large flat screen tv mounted wall well appointed spotless luxurious bathroom room also quiet didnt hear noise brickell avenue corridor perfect short stay hotel room whole hotel modern sophisticated tasteful spotlessly clean surprised quiet hotel seemed maybe stayed friday night assume hotel probably lot busier business people week nights getting late body confused casual barrestaurant quick bite eat salad husband burger food arrived quickly good service little laid back werent many customers didnt trouble getting attention wanted something supposedly nice restaurant next jw marriott brewery restaurant also across road hotel didnt time try either unfortunately bed excellent slept like princess used gym next morning think may 24 hour sure didnt see guests one cleaner left machines pretty good tvs plug thought machines disappointing plenty complimentary bottles water available gym also room reception nice touch probably spoilt good gym home thought jw marriott gym perfectly acceptable didnt use swimming pool looked nice pretty small nice quick breakfast main hotel restaurant huge selection looked like good buffet plus good la carte choice fairly pricey treat expense account fine good food good service enjoyable checkout efficient friendly checkin one doormen taxi us short taxi ride 15 minutes 25 port miami satisfied stay hotel spot short precruise stays business trips looking resort hotel bustling hotel look elsewhere suited us perfectly would absolutely hesitation staying recommending others

Reviews.Title: “Great location for Marathon”

properties around downtown miami south beach property availability way late january rooms available starting 400 night stay included buffet breakfast sunday morning husband said really quite nice property located brickell ave many high office buildings printed directions hotel im glad wasnt readily entrance hotel parking 27 per night 9 per hour appeared us valet valet staff courteous quite efficient checkin pretty efficient hotel accurate record points used reservation hotel lobby spacious filled beautiful seating areas lots dark wood marble floors room 17th floor looking city miami appears city high offices room reasonably large light airy nice furniture lovely new marriott bedding desk chair computer keyboard though laptop easy chair minibar drawers flat screen tv bottled water provided charge bathroom seemed bit small side single sink plentiful good quality towels type shower curtain give feel space shower generous toiletries aware hairdryer stored closet outside bathroom wait seemed needed something however nice attentive around able walk dinner nearby italian restaurant though notice almost nothing store restaurant bars etc open within area hotel weekend would assume would area appeared virtually deserted saturday hotel near beaches activity south beach coconut grove made think business hotel rather place take family vacation lunch day departure bit disappointing ate la cafe hotel experienced indifferent extremely slow service wasnt busy bit wait staff jw marriott miami served purpose relatively free stay short notice one night visit family business hotel would say good choice family vacation really experience miami head water beaches rates charge season id consider options

Reviews.Content: stayed 8 nights jw marriott miami christmas pleased hotel beautiful bar lobby particularly beautiful english club decor well done also nonsmoking enjoyed cocktail dinner also loved pool area super huge nice bar food service great treat excellent food drinks brought lounge pool heated even breeze little cool comfortable swim room large beautiful lots extras like inroom safe minibar counter tops 42 flat screen tv upgraded linens bath products one great touch free internet access via computer terminal room loved easy convenient check email get info net room service good access concierge lounge great breakfast buffet overall service excellent staff polite prompt professional lot immediate area around hotel mentioned previous review hotel 10 15 minutes south beach took highway 1 north venetian turn right st think near easy drive never encountered much traffic one thing hotel also close key biscayne beaches also 10 15 minute drive little traffic lunch dinner restaurants cant got great rate marriott price hotel steal primarily business hotel thoroughly enjoyed using vacation hotel highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Author: Mariya T
Reviews.Content: returned stay jw marriott brickell avenue miami pleasure staying concierge level impressed beautiful food reminded ritz carlton club floor room beautiful yellow 42 lcd tv mounted wall service around outstanding

Reviews.Title: “Great views of Barcelona”

Reviews.Content: hotel overall fairly nice average rooms service good cheap breakfast 10 euros free wifi got room 90 euros one night overall good value street tons traffic noise level fairly high good quiet hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location, room and srvice.”
Reviews.Author: Thai0710
Reviews.Content: wanted stay ramblas near centre city knowing gaudis work basically lots see sagrada cathedral agent didnt tell going town horrible hotel found taxi drove us travel short money worried breakfast included paid city tour left home fit walk ramblas guell park degrees nearly us city tour didnt turn waited 2 mornings receptionist didnt want help though didnt like time leave wouldnt give us late checkout werent going fly till 6pm long trip hot went toilets wash trip home receptionist followed dont normally staff plentiful move experience ruined visit barcelona view rooftops bathroom narrow wouldnt advise people go unless love long walk see something worthwhile

Reviews.Title: “FOUR STAR JOKE”
Reviews.Author: ernest f
Reviews.Content: first time family mother two one kid went europe excellent trip decided go barcelona got excellent deal hotel catalonia suite hotel apparently name changed recently catalonia barcelona reception nice talked good english rooms big clean breakfast wasnt spanish international fresh yummy metro station five minute walk hotel really good near super market bread cheese made sandwiches dinner took barcelona bus good decision walked 20 mins nearest tourist bus station went see best barcelona including sagrada familia montjuic area area took metro placa espanya night magic fountain show placa catalunya walked hour parc guell really enjoyed trip sleep quality best

Reviews.Title: “fine lacklustre hotel”
Reviews.Author: naomieliza
Reviews.Content: first time held hotel football team barcelona cup one stayed 7 days 4th day wardrobe door fell wardrobe sliding piece glass frame door hit one kids head thank god boy hurt badly door glass pieces came room noticed bottom door faulty door went rail fell apologised gave instructions reception change room something didnt happen hotel fully booked boys parents wanted hotel incident since apologised check day three days asked room luggage given one check 11 clock bus would come 4 clock afternoon 3 clock joke manager hotel came cost broken door pay three days told nothing one hour leaving hotel luggages locked room pay go refused pay explained situation hotel somebody could hurt badly incident joke manager hotel insisted door broken boys actually boys hurt parents got joke manager called police arrived without 4 stage joke manager asked us pay half price end cheap insisted cost police arrived looking asked police duty replied yes questions asked replied came coffee therefore told joke manager would give us luggage go held asked take action one showed told us pay bus already waiting 20 minutes could lose flight people left decision manager police leave us go airport ridiculous part story 34 rooms booked 7 nights least chain hotels like catalonia hotels able cover minor damage even made guests case faulty door really bad accident happened paid would lose flight reported incident police airport country joke manager joke faces camera also catalonia hotels also report joke manager higher catalonia hotels chain brand apart incident location far away centre bar without bartender time times wouldnt change therefore would give drinks unless didnt want change restaurant service total could wait 20 minutes dishes buffet also plates breakfast cheese ham could take ages food though tasty reception friendly helpfull could speak english manager total joke

Reviews.Title: “Smoker's paradise!”
Reviews.Author: Jim A
Reviews.Content: hotel part large chain hotels barcelona ones suburb reach centre bus metro allow 30 minutes rush quite liked seeing everyday life theres nice cafes breakfast nearby hotel 4 star uk standards first night put room blocked sink really smelled complained morning told would fix returned afternoon spoke different shift manager note apologetic moved us another room immediately also got 6am wake call group australia nothing hotel full groups would say suitable group tours couples apart little would say good value money dont mind staying bit town

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased”
Reviews.Author: rubyzh
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights would consider irish 3star city visit great staff lovely porters friendly rooms clean didnt eat dont know distance city centre 10mins bus approx depending traffic bus stop outside door bus service brilliant quiet night nice bar next door good cafes breakfast near supermarket close overall great location much cheaper city centre travelling airport coach takes close stop close hotel return airport make sure get correct bus going terminal 2 time would send friends hotel

Reviews.Title: “good location but that`s all”
Reviews.Author: Liz M
Reviews.Content: ive really enjoyed stay hotel barcelona vacation hotel perfect room big clean staff kind willing help arrived early morning theyve immediately offered room ready several hours official checkin indeed ready 11 room clean spacious great wifi connection theres minibar didnt use location hotel loud centre town easily walk lovely sights take 10 mins ride metro el station minutes away perfect want party return quiet area sleep breakfast nice though admittedly im much breakfast person happy pretty much anything bottom line nice clean hotel lively area full restaurants area perfect good night sleep great huge rooms bathrooms

Reviews.Title: “Ecxellent”
Reviews.Author: Dobrinka B
Reviews.Content: great hotel stuff really helpful room jacuzzi big extra bad kid breakfast good ate every morning took fruits metro 5 min walk 5 stops center thing last metro around midnight taxi around euro taxi airport 2 adults 1 kid 2 suitcases around 30 euro traffic

Reviews.Title: “'Beware' very bad experience, not as committed on website”
Reviews.Author: collectivewisdom
Reviews.Content: cleanliness super hotel however location nearly park however metro station el 200 metres thanks everything hotel catalonia suite

Reviews.Title: “overpriced lack lustre 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wellington540
Reviews.Content: well situated close underground links city centre far enough away avoid crowds noise hotel perfect travellers ages hotel modern clean staff welcoming polite always available answer questions went way provide local advice even locations directions maps breakfast room basement bright choice food superb fresh coffee vast array fresh fruit meats cheeses traditional breakfast items room clean modern well equipped well much talked whirlpool bath walk shower would hesitate use hotel

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT HOTEL FOR BUSINESS”
Reviews.Author: Surya_11
Reviews.Content: hotel catalonia suite nice 4 star hotel barcelona rooms modern new comfy beds nice marble bathrooms bad part rooms windows opened outside interior courtyard smokers hotel two blocks metro station take center city major quite residential neighborhood apartments sell high prices like tv broken didnt time use staff indifferent fairly rude helping find camera memory card left hotel departure said disappeared

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: Dinala_10
Reviews.Content: great hotel incredibly clean rooms huge whirlpool jet bath separate shower room top quality front desk staff able sort complicated booking without problems although air con failed room language barrier seemed prevent understanding problem breakfasts excellent get chance check diner across road theres also handy corner shop route train station 5 mins walk away small essentials need

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: shruti b
Reviews.Content: stayed catalonia suite hotel couple nights october enjoyable sure would rate hotel 4 star lacked extra something dont get wrong everything fine clean outstanding found service bit smile cost side breakfast buffet good bathrooms well equipped location ok although central easy get around metro closest station walk

Reviews.Title: “LOVELY HOTEL”

Reviews.Content: nice hotel near plaza catalunya clean rooms friendly staff nice breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Worth staying here”
Reviews.Author: ndragan
Reviews.Content: hotel good location barcelona central metro close hotel hotel tried use bathroom towel noticed blood towel since hurry couldnt report hotel management however still disgusting think couldnt imagine big touristic hotel hotel could location might perfect however little detail good things hotel healthy environment must important aspect hotel beyond attractive features

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL, we will came back”

Reviews.Content: pros nice sized room comfortable bed free breakfast free wifi free safe roomy bathroom good location close metro train stations expensive cons nothing major stayed business found great 4star hotel would definitely stay

Reviews.Content: spent 2 nights hotel recently decent however would certainly rate 4 star hotel simple seems old hotel relatively well maintained rooms extremely small dont expect much terms spacious however room rather nice little balcony little picky floor could really used besides clean best thing hotel perfect location close big shopping mall plaza recommend hotel sure expect luxury

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel - except...”

Reviews.Content: clean enough location good close main areas

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel bad restaurant service”

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel !”

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights october 2011 room always clean hotel staff helpful breakfast buffet included variety breads cheeses meats eggs wish hotel right across street shopping center large food court nice restaurants top floor metro stop links different lines easy get around city also alot walking sites area espanya montjuic etc would definetly recommend hotel family friends

Reviews.Title: “Large good quality hotel,”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights october 2011 first night discovered wash basin blocked wardrobe door stuck made noise opened electric hanging wall peeling paint broken door frame reported appeared room late afternoon next day removed two black blocked wash basin drain using sent mass black around basin spent 2 hours approximately wardrobe phoned reception ask someone clean basin noone appeared 20 minutes later went reception ask cleaner told cleaner would come immediately case hurry explained disgusting black round basin health wanted basin cleanliness appear priority hotel cleaner eventually appear finally appeared

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for the great experience”

Reviews.Content: wonderful hotel 4 days like much view room amazing big shop centre corner direct bus airport easy go city center tourist barcelona big variety buffet staff reception helpful patient us recommended every one

Reviews.Content: booked superior room hotel via catalonia group website standard facilites little normal double room included bottle water cookies free tea coffee making facilities apart services reaching hotel one help bags got taxi front hotel entrance reception lady took entire payment right time check credit card asked wait minutes single bell reaching room working water bottle cookies tea coffee making facilities call reception house keeping number call room service lady answers phone english long came able start airconditioning said temperature control gone bad work knowing would make room cold temperature thermostat work asked reception offered change room one plaza view stuff conference attend asked continue room get thermostat repaired replaced next day said yes would next day room things much time couldnt go conference day nothing done temperature control next day even day every night freezing till wake middle night shut reminded seems totally reception refused agree fact provide tea coffee making tray room clearly mentioned booking website check repeated long time man reception said yes mentioned website wrong still send tea making tray send water cookies client well took settled next day room cleaned water bottle cookies replaced asked ones speak english said call room service water bottle came cookies still seen searched tea coffee tray milk powder calling room service brought milk milk without cover surprised standard service case could keep milk long decided tea without milk today third day hotel today came back conference surprise find water bottle first night forgotten electrical adapter laptop plug system different country asked come reception waited hour without anybody helping go search outside great difficulty dont speak spanish amazed doesnt open fully wardrobe doors stuck difficult move one hotel pay much

Reviews.Title: “Style, quality and location”
Reviews.Author: Spainsunwater
Reviews.Content: stay hotel week whilst attending conference unfortunately one available time vicinity extremely disappointed didnt compare another similar priced well located 4star hotel barcelona husband went conference another madrid stayed trip avoid breakfast overpriced large room school hospital room slightly grubby poorly maintained tv initially didnt work promised repair next day didnt happen without additional tv reception appalling window handle coming mould bathroom tile pay 5 euros inroom safe deposit seemed bus tour groups staying regularly perhaps get away mediocre stay 12 nights would stay recommend anyone thing going location handy transport shopping centre fountains montjuic

Reviews.Title: “An hotel like in a communist country”
Reviews.Author: French-Doctor
Reviews.Content: sure 4 star hotel older bathrooms perhaps dated pool area lacks amenities true 4 star hotel price 4 star hotel either paid euros metro literally outside door aerobus directly across street easy airport transportation nice cafes nearby mall directly also great views free internet first 3 nights barcelona stayed hotel last night hotel much preferred hotel given view pool location make back barcelona would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with an amazing staff, Thank You Joel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: mvmfla
Reviews.Content: best thing hotel fantastic people come see barcelona metro station huge mall excellent prefer receive fresh room ok clean fantastic view plaza reception people speak english like help despite fact stay room facing day placa didnt hear general arthur said shall return

Reviews.Title: “Good location and nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: jgreenwood
Reviews.Content: 1 good hotel great location 2 metro outside around plaza 3 station plaza catalonia ramblas line 1 red 3 near shops food big supermarket 4 ok

Reviews.Title: “TOO MUCH!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: MSmith42
Reviews.Content: negative got room next airconditioning system something noise kept awake bed even room smelled like cigarette smoke television broke took three times complaining first two times politely last time less politely received new tv sink didnt run smoothly toilet didnt flush well check service friendly check even positive breakfast good plenty free wifi connection airport

Reviews.Title: “Excellent food, Brilliant Location, Helpful Staff. Great location for Sightseeing!!!”
Reviews.Author: popplingtonner
Reviews.Content: loved barcelona plaza great location plaza 7 minutes centre barcelona metro station outside hotel also use tax expensive eur 800 like walking 20 minutes walk helpful polite staff breakfast fantastic leaving morning coming back afternoon find clean cool room waiting us rooms spacious floor wooden liked much would recommend hotel friends would stay anytime

Reviews.Title: “Exellent service”
Reviews.Author: EdinburghCarola
Reviews.Content: doubt great location right opposite montjuic metro station right doorstep bus stop next door taxis always parked outside unlike ramblas street prefer quite nice crowded doesnt get hotel numbers mean adjoining rooms front office staff smile mile away pay electric kettle place sleep overnight breakfast eggs finished

Reviews.Title: “A REAL 4 STARS HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: nancyLondres_uk_
Reviews.Content: 1 reception unpleasant 2 pay inroom safe hotel safe available 3 electric kettle means make coffeetea room 4 breakfast 16 5 bathroom door broken 6 weak air conditioning

Reviews.Title: “Clean and pleasant, good location if you don't mind 2 metro stops, must get a room with a view”
Reviews.Author: epaton_feldman
Reviews.Content: lot research choosing barcelona hotel arriving ferry leaving cruise ship wanted somewhat near port bad neighborhood also didnt want spend ridiculous amount stay hotels location plaza espana perfect view plaza fountains beyond room bed comfortable bathtub deep wireless free extra amenities bathrobes bottled water real glass bottle nice touch ample security lobby felt safe day night metro outside door would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Convenient hotel:keep in mind what you have read here, then it's not that bad.”
Reviews.Author: kerouac-ky
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights may 2011 hotel stay pleasant overall location quite good hotel still holding booking deposit almost 3 weeks checking despite numerous telephone email follow hotel staff concerned yet nothing done yet terrible experience lack professionalism certainly make stay away future

Reviews.Title: “Good Location Medium Hotel”
Reviews.Author: pellegrina_leone
Reviews.Content: fantastic hotel pleasant helpfull staff boyfriend went quiet relaxing break place hotel everything brochure said would special thanks every single member couldnt enough help magic breakfast lovely restaurant

Reviews.Title: “this is not a 4 * hotel!”
Reviews.Author: amcellig
Reviews.Content: stayed room april good 1 hotel located 10 meters underground though ramblas 2 room size room big needed 2 years old toddler run inside room bad 1 breakfast staff service horrible see stories 13 2 room several room noisy noise coming hotel water bathroom wasnt good sink seemed mirror entrance broken 3 everything cost money internet key room safe 5 euros per day ok 1 breakfast 2 information service fine story 1 wanted get regular cold water baby stuff member gave bottle pure water glass place bottle near bottles another stuff member thought took bottle shouldnt like thinking steal bottle story 2 breakfast 10 meters us woman 20th dropped small box sugar bags bags place 3 staff members 510 meters none offer help story 3 one day wanted seat 5 minutes couldnt find member help us

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Hotel”
Reviews.Author: murphbopsolo9
Reviews.Content: weve robbed inside hotel ten minutes leaving group airport someone took wallet mobile phone camera since ten minutes leave much time anything informed tourist guide phoned card inside wallet mobile phone number airport ten minutes leaving airport two members group robbed hotel staff nothing didn’t even ask sorry incident also security emergency doors left open supposed closed maybe got away easily maybe working together members hotel staff knows one thing sure definitely happen four stars hotel helpful also try learn english spanish learn spanish language visit barcelona 4 days otherwise maybe business

Reviews.Title: “Warning - More poor star than four star”
Reviews.Author: Cork2CorkIreland
Reviews.Content: hotel locate square right front famous magic fountain barcelona window view palace see fountain directly room friend room overlooking amazed service hotel unbelievable people reception nice kind answered question always tried help us say 2 lines metro passing really next hotel really easy travel like lines advice everyone know coming barcelona stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing ... should be better.”
Reviews.Author: marknmeils
Reviews.Content: first barcelona booked hotel part package deal exterior hotel ny look inside large reception lounge area leading restaurant snack bar piano bar recommended room standard size hotel type comfortably furnished fridge safe extra sat tv also good equipped hairdryer room cleaned daily without exception staff times friendly helpful always polite even wasnt always spot major tourist travel routes easily reached hotel would go back definitely would book inside room like window open night traffic noise quite loud brilliant place stay

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: pazit3
Reviews.Content: hotel located metro station espanya near hotel got good restaurants st hotel clean staff helpful needed rooms clean room without view next time coming ask room view free wifi ask name password room safe cost per day need deposit hotel got spa like seems good didnt got time come back barcelona would return hotel yes friend family would recommend hotel staying barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Vasilijo
Reviews.Content: good location metro station nice swim

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Welcome To Spain”
Reviews.Author: NCcatpeople
Reviews.Content: good good service bar good food breakfast bar enjoyed stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location but....”
Reviews.Author: REDOL
Reviews.Content: colleagues pleased services especially liked fact everything clean tidy im coming back barcelona new years eve ive already made reservations wait

Reviews.Title: “terrible terrible”
Reviews.Author: patrick8
Reviews.Content: came back today 4 nights stay got 3 rooms 3rd back noise came kitchen lot noise made groups teenagers trips breakfast great rooms size bit small clean comfortable weather last days nice heating way open windows order cool rooms free wifi worked perfectly

Reviews.Title: “OK But Not Great - Would not Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: Amandamanx
Reviews.Content: maybe worst hotel ever stayed way four star hotel oct 2010 1 gave us room first floor looking nowhere please look picture view window asked another room said possible asked upgrade room move us another room matter cost said possible every solution trying get always negative answer reception manager said anything believe problems everything 2 breakfast good unpleasant place 3 system bathroom order someone came see never fixed drink end day 4 staff friendly act like favor serve good place piano bar one played piano least hours visited friendly place bartender person hotel polite first time writing something bad things hotel visited

Reviews.Title: “Just about OK”
Reviews.Author: Tagesthemen
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel part group attended arrived day earlier barcelona wanted book hotel day earlier ridiculously expensive booked alternative hotel days travel however checked rate dropped decided stay therefore always look last minute specials catalonia barcelona plaza hotel staff friendly room clean spacious nothing special unfortunately dont think deserve 4 stars would rather rate good 3 star property location excellent though direct train connections fira 2 also good underground connections airport bus aerobus stops right outside well sightseeing bus also lot little restaurants within walking distance internet hotel though extremely slow rather choose alternative option straight away frustrating business traveler would stay definitely rate
